welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Reggio Emilia! Known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and lively culture, we invite you to explore and savor all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Giuseppe Verdi Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Giuseppe Verdi Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'PMF Free WiFi' and following the prompts.
